      Be prepared to relive the first nightmare  in Resident  Evil  0,  a
      remastered version of the popular prequel to the  original Resident
      Evil  game.  This  remastered  version  takes    the  fear-inducing
      atmosphere from the original 2002 release and  transforms  it  with
      stunning new HD visuals, improved sound, widescreen support  and an
      optional modernized control system and more.
